description: Example codes indicating the reason why the activity isn't yet started, is on hold, was cancelled, etc. Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.
name: CarePlanActivityStatusReason

text.div: • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/procedure-not-performed-reason, http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/immunization-status-reason, http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationrequest-status-reason

title: Care Plan Activity Status Reason
